WorkItem.Description: Rawr is reporting that my defense is 547, but when I log in and check it in game it says 532. I've been having this problem with Rawr since I first downloaded it a few days ago. As a DK that is trying to use this program to optimize after I get DPS capped I find this very flustering. Can someone please fix this bug or explain what I am doing wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: [TankDK] Reported Defense higher than in game

Comments.Message: I'm going to guess this is an issue with enchants/sigils (specifically the sigil that gives defense rating). However with no character file posted and no armory link, it is rather hard to figure out what is going wrong.

Devwar, you were dead on! I had the relic that gave me Defense when ever I use ivy touch. I guess it was counting that where as WoW wouldn't unless I triggered the attack. I really appreciate the insight!

Correct.  I'm working on getting the rotation triggers more involved w/ actual numbers shown in the UI, so as long as you have a 30 sec or less rotation, and have an IT in there, then you get the extra defense.  Admittedly, I don't personally gear assuming that the buff is active anymore, but it's a good cover for when you may be short.
